title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Learning Theory-Based Modeling for Science Education Technology Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply science education design principles based on learning theories (e.g., constructivism, behaviorism).
Learners can systematically align learning objectives with assessment methods when designing science activities using educational technology tools.
Learners can write an effectiveness analysis report on designed science education technology through peer feedback and teacher mentoring.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
